2.panel_description: Provide weather and news for each vacation spot.

1.handles: Fetches news articles for each vacation spot

input_vars.name: news_query
input_vars.description: Vacation spot names for news search
input_vars.value: News about Rome, Italy; Venice, Italy; Prague, Czech Republic; Dubrovnik, Croatia; Budapest, Hungary

output_vars.name: news_articles
output_vars.description: News articles for each vacation spot
